website_summaries.verdict: Pick the style of glass, handle and track that best suits your decor with this versatile product.
pros: Doors can be configured to fit many different installations with an adjustable range of about 8 inches
Uses certified quarter-inch safety glass that contains a coating to resist water spots
Can select from clear, Niebla, rain, or transition glass styles
cons: Requires a perfectly level bathtub area, or the doors may leak

customer_reviews.title: WAYTOO FRAGILE
customer_reviews.text: While cleaning door...it exploded into a million pieces! I am grateful no one was hurt
customer_reviews.author: CARL BACK

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these doors. When I received the doors, five major parts where missing. When I called about the issue, all they could do was send me the parts missing with a whole new unit that will take 3 days, even as a prime member. And I had to take on the stress of packaging and sending back the heavy doors and other not missing parts back to them even though they were at fault. With no reimbursement for my troubles. The installment wasn't easy. And for this stress the value wasn't worth it. The stars I gave was from me liking the door design, that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice doors But ,
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice doors . They look good , better than a shower curtain. The only reason I took a star off is because when you open one of the doors it slides closed about 6 inches then stops . Only one door and I'm thinking the track is off inside the top railing a little . Other than that the doors where easy to install . If going thru ceramic tile I would recommend getting a good drill bit makes it so much easier .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Potential risk of damage during the shipment was my major concern because it always take a lot of time to return it and wait for a new shipment. But it turned out that the shipment went out efficiently and smoothly. It took me about one hour to install it. I glued it from the inner side and it dried and ready to use in two hours. I attached the picture about the track in the bottom to give more useful information to other potential buyers because this detail is very important to keep the shower door clean. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lam

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These sliding doors gave our very dated bathroom a clean, updated look. The only problem we encountered was one of the doors shattered when my husband was holding it to install. Fortunately he wasn't hurt. The company immediately sent another door and the installation went smoothly. The doors slide well and don't leak at all. Would have given it five stars if the door hadn't shattered.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Door, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This door was such a great deal and looked great. I put it in myself so it wasn't that easy for me, but I'm sure with another person would have been a lot easier. Door was used for and upgrade to guest bathroom and really changed the look. If I can find my photos I will post. I sold home so can't get photos now.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy install , but it is good quality, well balanced and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Installation is a bit challenging, especially if you need to cut the metal pieces (like me) it is NOT soft aluminum, it is hard and difficult to cut. The doors are well balanced and it looks great. All things considered, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ABT

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shower doors
customer_reviews.text: Bought these doors to replace our shower curtain and don't regret it. Very pretty and great quality. My husband watched a Youtube video on how to install and he was able to do it by himself in one day. Very pleased with outcome.
customer_reviews.author: MariQ.

customer_reviews.title: Delta Shower Doors
customer_reviews.text: Free shipping right to my home! The Delta customer service department is very good at following up on your specific needs. And the doors are beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I got my shower door with missing handles, I called and emailed looking for support but nobody answer.. I do not like to write reviews but I am taking this way to find some help. Everything else was good, is a very good quality door and easy to install. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, Great Customer Service Experience
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Simple installation. When it arrived, the box was opened/damaged during shipping. No damage to the product, but the box with the door handles must have fallen out of the shipping box. No problem, sent tracking number, .jpg screenshot of receipt, and address to Delta via email and had a replacement in two days. They were very responsive! Happy with the product but always appreciate it much more when backed by great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jammed

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong door design and they couldn't help me with that but the set I did receive is good quality. I'll use them until I can get the correct ones. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rocksister

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BATH TUB ENCOLSURE
customer_reviews.text: This Bath Tub Enclosure was easy to install and with the coating on the shower side of the glass does not leave water marks.
customer_reviews.author: topspin

customer_reviews.title: This door looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried that it would be delivered and be damaged but it was wrapped tight and it was easy to install. We did need some tools to drill through our glass tile but other than that it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The glass is beautiful. Looks like rain drops
customer_reviews.text: Take your time and do the installation properly and you will love this. Extremely high quality. I took about 4 hours to put mine in and it looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my tub perfectly. The doors had to be adjusted to fit the sides which flared out 1/4” in top.
customer_reviews.author: G S CORLISS

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love it after using it for about half-year and still love the way it looks. It is easy to clean soap scum off of glass and easy to slide. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Look very stylish and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these doors are better than doors ive purchased at bigger home co struction brands. I used to pay 300-500 for shower doors and they would be a hassle to install. These doors are much cheaper but probably even better quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: estuPro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!  Just the look I was going for!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a frosted tub/shower door but was having a problem finding one that I liked that didn't break the bank! Then I found this one on Amazon. It is installed (by a contractor) and looks great! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sliding shower doors. Pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: We love these doors on our new rehabbed bathroom. One door isn’t quite as easy while sliding as when first installed. Still looking into it. May need a slight adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: PatienceNeeded

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Yery good price. Very well packaged Hard to beat Delta quality
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice.  Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: No issues during install...seems to be working well. Kids love it. Glass is very nice and thick. I think this was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Don Fifer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking doors and well built
customer_reviews.text: Not hard at all to install. Just takes a little time and patience and some basic skills & tools.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Water slightly leak from the bottom of the inside track; other than that, everything is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed I.

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed by the quality of these shower doors
customer_reviews.text: I installed these shower doors about a month ago and I am impressed by the overall quality
customer_reviews.author: Frank H L

customer_reviews.title: Glass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The glass literally exploded. This is our 2nd one we purchased the first for our master bathroom we had no issues but this one randomly exploded in me and my assistants hands. I am now worried about the first one I installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Doors
customer_reviews.text: Nice doors, but we were missing several parts and Delta is very slow to send replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Farley

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for your bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to install and overall quality of this Shower Door is good. Good choice for your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: dmptrv

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower door and nice added attraction to our master bath.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Stinky doors
customer_reviews.text: The door smell bad. I called Delta and they sent me the same door stoppers with same terrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The outside glass is damaged along the edge, hard to see on picture, it's dangerous because it's sharp.
customer_reviews.author: H.Do

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.text: I like what you sent me. I installed it myself. Looks good and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with outstanding package for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This product was excellent. It is beautiful and assembly was easy. The packing was outstanding. The glass doors and all hardware came through in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: This shower door is good solution to our problem and it looks great too
customer_reviews.text: We had floor damage due to water splash from the shower with basic rod and curtain. This shower door is good solution to our problem and it looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: We use to have shower curtain, excellent decision to buy this door. It’s bit pricey but well made.
customer_reviews.author: Balwant Singh

customer_reviews.title: Not for out of square surrounds in old houses.
customer_reviews.text: Door was good quality and would have been simple to install, if the opening had been perfectly square. The rollers have 3 holes to adjust height and it could have compensated for the out of square issue. However when in the lowest hole, it the roller bracket rubs on he track itself, major design flaw. As for doors not staying closed, yes those reviews are correct if the top track is not perfectly level the high side will self open but when leveled they work good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff624

customer_reviews.title: very nice, very classy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, very nice, very classy, quality product, I would recommend this to anyone looking for nice glass shower doors! Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The doors look and work great. I was worried about the shipping but it ...
customer_reviews.text: The doors look and work great. I was worried about the shipping but it arrived in perfect condition. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I don't remember the website stating the height of the doors and they ended up being a little shorter than I would have liked (54 inch opening).
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Curtis

product_meta.title: Delta Shower Doors SD3276614 Trinsic Semi-Frameless Traditional Sliding Bathtub Door 60in.x58-1/8in, Chrome Track
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Frosted| Style:Trinsic Handle| Color:ChromeWhether you are completing a full bathroom remodel or just looking for a great stand-alone weekend project, DELTA has a shower door for you! create your own custom look in 3 easy steps with these beautiful shower doors. Choose your glass, choose your track assembly kit and select your matching handle. The DELTA trinsic Collection offers the sleek elegance of modern, European design to create looks from classic modern to modern Rustic. The trinsic handle features a convenient place to store your towels. Paired with the reversible traditional top track, the uncomplicated, sleek and modern trinsic handle provides warmth and welcome with refined edges and symmetry for a familiar and balanced design.
feature_bullets: Fits doors with a minimum 50-1/8 in. To a maximum 59-3/8 in. (127 cm to 151 cm) opening, with a 58-1/8 in. (143.5 cm) of height, walk-in Width of 21-3/32 in. To 29-3/32 in. (54 cm to 74 cm)
All DELTA shower doors are designed to accommodate out-of-plumb (uneven) conditions totaling 3/8”
Track assembly kit crafted of anodized aluminum for it's strength and corrosion resistance that can be cut to size for better installation flexibility; top track is reversible for two design options
Premium 6 mm (1/4 in.) ANSI certified tempered safety glass with Spot Guard glass coating for easy cleaning and to resist water spots; Frosted glass provides partial privacy.

Trinsic shower door handle doubles as a convenient place to dry wet towels or stage decorative towels. Shower door comes with a 5 year limited warranty. Complete your bathroom update with the matching Delta Trinsic collection bath hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
